Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires the metropolitan transportation authority to post signage over mass transit seats indicating that individuals should give up their seats for the elderly, pregnant and disabled
Summary: Requires the metropolitan transportation authority to post signage over mass transit seats indicating that individuals should give up their seats for the elderly, pregnant and disabled; provides such signage shall be conspicuously posted and visible from all seats; costs and expenses paid through appropriated funds.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-l, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to priority seating for pregnant, elderly, and disabled passengers
